data.comment: Blackburn kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Tobias Figueiredo (Nottingham) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
Nottingham kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Harry Arter is replacing Jack Colback for the away team.
In the minute 53, The home team have replaced Tyrhys Dolan with Sam Gallagher. This is the first substitution made today by Tony Mowbray.
Blackburn's Bradley Johnson has been booked in Blackburn.
Harry Chapman is on a sub for John Buckley for Blackburn.
In the minute 72, Sam Gallagher is booked for the home team.
Chris Hughton (Nottingham) is making a second substitution, with Lyle Taylor replacing Lewis Grabban.
Tony Mowbray is making the team's third substitution at Ewood Park with Luke Brennan replacing Ben Brereton.
It's 0-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Nottingham take a 0-1 lead thanks to Joe Lolley.
Samba Sow is replacing Joe Lolley for Nottingham at Ewood Park.
